TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ObjectMaterializedEventHandler(object sender, ObjectMaterializedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ObjectMaterializedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"> instance that triggered the event.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectMaterializedEventArgs"> object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.ObjectMaterialized"> event of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
